tool_description: Validates subscription plan modifications against regulatory requirements, consumer protection laws, and company policies.

jurisdiction.description: Legal jurisdiction: US, EU, UK, CA, AU

change_type.description: Type of modification: price_increase, terms_change, feature_modification

price_increase_percentage.description: Percentage of price increase if applicable

notice_period_days.description: Days of advance notice provided to customers

allows_cancellation.description: Whether customers can cancel without penalty

grandfathering_offered.description: Whether existing customers can keep current terms

error_messages: Invalid jurisdiction: Must be one of [US, EU, UK, CA, AU].
Invalid change_type: Must be one of [price_increase, terms_change, feature_modification].
Invalid price_increase_percentage: Must be a positive number when provided.
Insufficient notice_period: Notice period does not meet regulatory requirements for the jurisdiction.
Invalid contract_type: Must be one of [monthly, annual, multi_year].
Compliance violation: The proposed changes violate consumer protection laws in the specified jurisdiction.
usage: Provide jurisdiction, change_type, notice_period_days, contract_type, and allows_cancellation. Include price_increase_percentage for price changes and set grandfathering_offered if applicable.

is_compliant.description: Whether the changes meet all compliance requirements

compliance_issues.description: List of compliance violations or concerns

required_disclosures.description: Legal disclosures that must be included in customer communications

minimum_notice_days.description: Minimum required notice period for the jurisdiction
